get.summary: Accessing all orders from the system, this is used by admin
Filtering the orders by given parameters

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Get the order using a given id

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search By id, code, user_id, farmer_id, farmer_name, farmer_email,farmer_phone, user_id,user_phone,user_email,user_name

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Get orders for a given user_id [ NOTE you can also combine { user_id && farmer_id } eg. ?user_id=1&farmer_id=2 ]

parameters.name: farmer_id
parameters.description: Get orders for a given farmer_id [ NOTE you can also combine { user_id && farmer_id } eg. ?user_id=1&farmer_id=2 ]

post.summary: Creating a new order into the system.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user id for person making an order

parameters.name: farmer_id
parameters.description: The farmer id to whom the order is going to

parameters.name: payment_method
parameters.description: Payment method the user is using

parameters.name: delivery_location
parameters.description: The location where order will be delivered to.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: JSON STRINGIFY Order details eg [{"product_id":1,"quantity":5,"unit_price":5000,"discount":50},{"product_id":2,"quantity":2,"unit_price":12000,"discount":0}]

put.description: This can include [ payment_method:string, is_delivered:{0,1}, other_details:string, delivery_location:string, rating:integer ]

parameters.name: key

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: JSON STRINGIFY your data, Fields include [ payment_method:string, is_delivered:{0,1}, other_details:string, delivery_location:string, rating:integer ]
